pci_projects_project_inactive_title_pend: An invoice for this project is pending payment
pci_projects_project_inactive_title_susp: Your project has been suspended due to an outstanding payment
pci_projects_project_inactive_descriptio: Please settle the amount. If you do not act quickly, the project will be suspended, and you will lose all of your associated services.
To reactivate your project, please settle the outstanding bill, then contact the Support team.
